hero.title: Your Healthcare
hero.subtitle: Instantly locate nearby hospitals, order medicines, access first aid guides, and connect with healthcare services. Your trusted healthcare companion.

emergencyServices.title: Emergency Services

emergencyServices.hospitalFinderDesc: Find nearby hospitals with real-time bed availability and wait times
emergencyServices.firstAidGuideDesc: Step-by-step emergency first aid instructions for common situations

emergencyServices.symptomCheckerDesc: AI-powered symptom analysis with risk assessment and recommended actions
emergencyServices.bloodBankFinderDesc: Locate nearby blood banks with real-time blood group availability
emergencyServices.doctorConnectDesc: 24/7 video consultations with verified medical professionals
